app_description: Relatoscope is an interactive visualization of career paths of current Slovenian political office holders – cabinet ministers, state secretaries and National Assembly deputies.

header.asset_tracker_help_text: The Asset Detector is a project by Oštro that presents information about the assets of political office holders.

help_text.time_in_office: The date on which the person was initially elected in a general election or appointed as a member of the government or as state secretary.
